title: Visual bug with the skin Arclight Vel'koz.
body: Noticed this while spectating a game. This Vel'koz' model was messed up; he had no tentacles!!!

replies.body:
Hey FIuffCow! 

Thanks for the report! We're working to resolve this; it's an issue with spectator mode.
gee I wonder how the Thresh adc team is losing.
